RelatedSentence: The Simon Community is calling on the Government to fast track the social housing strategy in a bid to tackle the growing homelessness problem .
It comes as official figures show that six new people end up homeless each day in Ireland , while housing list figures have grown by 42 % per cent in the past year .

A1: Action Group , set up by mothers affected by homelessness
RelatedSentence: A new Housing Action Group , set up by mothers affected by homelessness , will be launched today in a bid to force the Government to tackle the housing crisis .
